document_data.mainbody:
An unnamed archaic device was a rune arm kept at the Temple of Mystra in Kings Forest.
The archaic device was made out of some kind of gemstone.
By absorbing some incoming elemental damage, the archaic device could convert that energy into blasts of force. This energy additionally energized the wielders other weapons, allowing them to deal extra force-based damage.
Wielding the archaic device also boosted the effectiveness of casting spells and deflecting attacks.
The archaic device was stored alongside an ancient gemstone at the Temple of Mystra at some point before the deitys death and the Spellplague of the . The temple quickly became abandoned.
In the , after Ana Brabener was rescued by adventurers from the slavers Eldrin Szind, Odezzt Avithoul and Phargred Avithoul, the archaic device was taken from the temple.
